categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Tarken was a Nebulon-B2 frigate belonging to the Rebel Alliance. The Tarken attempted rescue the Rebel MC80 Star Cruiser Knights which was captured during a meeting with Bothans in a Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser called Doomer. The Tarken was disabled and captured as well, by Gamma-class ATR-6 assault transports with the assistance of Tan Maarek Stele.
